name: Re Parry
description:
RE PARRY

- Re Parry is a game made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020 -

PARRY THIS, YOU FILTHY CASUAL !

You are Re. Re is a blacksmith. Your kingdom is in war the darkness. Your army never came back from the battlefield. You took your strongest shield, your favorite hammer, and you're going to defend the city by yourself.

Parry to protect yourself.
Do perfect parries to annihilate enemies.
Repair your shield if needed.

CONTROLS

SPACE to parry

R to begin repairing

Arrows to repair

CREDITS

Thomas Lebrun (Raivk) : Art / Audio

Jean-Christophe Joubier (eFrag) : Code

Aurélien Feret (Alazarius) : Code
